00011 /*!\fn init_game_env( GAME_ENV **game )
00012  *\param game a pointer to a game structure to allocate
00013  *\return TRUE or FALSE
00014  */
00015 int init_game_env( GAME_ENV **game )
00016 {
00017                 if( !(*game) )
00018                 {
00019                                 Malloc( (*game) , GAME_ENV , 1 );
00020                                 if( !(*game ) )
00021                                 {
00022                                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Could not allocate a new game env" );
00023                                                 return FALSE ;
00024                                 }
00025                 }
00026                 (*game) -> BLUR = 1 ;
00027                 (*game) -> fade_value = 20 ;
00028                 (*game) -> DONE = 0 ;
00029                 (*game) -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_DIRECTX_WIN ;
00030                 (*game) -> CPU_MODE = CPU_USE_FULL ;
00031                 (*game) -> nb_min_particles = 0 ;
00032                 (*game) -> loop_time = 0 ;
00033                 (*game) -> draw_time = 0 ;
00034                 (*game) -> logic_time = 0 ;
00035                 (*game) -> wait_for_slowing_down_cpu = 0 ;
00036                 (*game) -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE = 20000 ;
00037                 (*game) -> LOGIC_RATE = 10000 ;
00038                 (*game) -> real_framerate = 0 ;
00039                 (*game) -> draw_time = 0 ;
00040                 (*game) -> score = 0 ;
00041                 (*game) -> lifes = 100 ;
00042                 (*game) -> level = 1 ;
00043                 (*game) -> x = 0 ;
00044                 (*game) -> y = 0 ;
00045                 (*game) -> z = 0 ;
00046                 (*game) -> left_attack = 0 ;
00047                 (*game) -> right_attack = 0 ;
00048                 (*game) -> scrbuf = NULL ;
00049 
00050                 return TRUE;
00051 } /* init_game_env */
00052

00055 /*!\fn void destroy_game_env( GAME_ENV **game )
00056  *\param game a pointer a to a game structure to destroy
00057  */
00058 void destroy_game_env( GAME_ENV **game )
00059 {
00060                 if( (*game) )
00061                 {
00062                                 if( (*game) -> scrbuf )
00063                                                 destroy_bitmap( (*game) -> scrbuf );
00064                                 Free( (*game ) );
00065                 }
00066 } /* destroy_game_env */

00070 /*!\fn GAME_ENV *load_game_config( char *config_name )
00071  *\brief load a config from file 
00072  *\param config_name the name of the game file config
00073  *\return Loaded config or NULL
00074  */
00075 GAME_ENV *load_game_config( char *config_name )
00076 {
00077                 FILE *config = NULL ;
00078                 char strbuf[ 1024 ] = "" ;
00079                 
00080                 /* CONFIGURATION STAGE */
00081     config = fopen( config_name , "rt" );
00082 
00083     if( !config )
00084     {
00085         n_log( LOG_ERR , "Error %s opening %s !" , strerror( errno ) , config_name );
00086                                 return NULL  ;
00087     }
00088                 
00089                 GAME_ENV *game = NULL ;
00090                 init_game_env( &game );
00091                 if( !game )
00092                 {
00093                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "Error allocating a new game object for %s !" , config_name );
00094                                 goto error ;
00095     }
00096                 
00097     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL ) /*error reading comment*/
00098     {
00099         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read comment ( line 1 ) in config.txt file !" );
00100         goto error ;
00101     }
00102 
00103     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL )
00104     {
00105          n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read GFX_CONFIG_MODE in config.txt file !" );
00106         goto error ;
00107     }
00108                 int it = 0 ;
00109                 while( strbuf[ it ] != '\0' && it < 1024 )
00110                 {
00111                                 if( strbuf[ it ] == '\n' )
00112                                                 strbuf[ it ] = '\0' ;
00113                                                 it ++ ;
00114                 }
00115                 
00116     if( strcmp( strbuf , "GFX_AUTODETECT" ) == 0 )
00117         game -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_AUTODETECT;
00118                 else if( strcmp( strbuf , "GFX_AUTODETECT_WINDOWED" ) == 0 )
00119         game -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_AUTODETECT_WINDOWED;
00120     else if( ustrcmp( strbuf , "GFX_DIRECTX_WIN" ) == 0 )
00121         game -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_DIRECTX_WIN;
00122     else if( ustrcmp( strbuf , "GFX_DIRECTX" ) == 0 )
00123         game -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_DIRECTX;  
00124                 else
00125                 {
00126                                 n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "WARNING: NO USABLE GFX_MODE LOADED FROM CONFIG FILE ! USING DEFAULT GFX_DIRECTX_WIN! tmpstr:\"%s\"" , strbuf );
00127                                 game -> GFX_CONFIG_MODE = GFX_DIRECTX_WIN;
00128                 }
00129 
00130     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL ) /*error reading comment*/
00131     {
00132                                 n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read comment ( line 3 ) in config.txt file !" );
00133         goto error ;
00134     }
00135 
00136     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL )
00137     {
00138         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read CPU_MODE in config.txt file ! \n");
00139         goto error ;
00140     }
00141 
00142     if( strncmp( strbuf , "CPU_USE_FULL" , 12 ) == 0 )
00143         game -> CPU_MODE = CPU_USE_FULL;
00144     else if( strncmp( strbuf , "CPU_USE_NICE" , 12 ) == 0 )
00145                                 game -> CPU_MODE = CPU_USE_NICE;
00146     else if( strncmp( strbuf , "CPU_USE_LESS" , 12 ) == 0 )
00147         game -> CPU_MODE = CPU_USE_LESS;
00148     else
00149                                 n_log( LOG_NOTICE ,  "WARNING: NO USABLE CPU_MODE LOADED FROM CONFIG FILE ! USING DEFAULT CPU_FULL_USE !\n" );
00150 
00151                 
00152                 if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL ) /*error reading comment*/
00153     {
00154         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read comment ( line 7 ) in config.txt file !" );
00155                                 goto error ;
00156     }
00157 
00158     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL )
00159     {
00160         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read nb_min_particles in config.txt file !");
00161         goto error ;
00162     }
00163                 game -> nb_min_particles = strtol( strbuf , NULL , 10 );
00164                 if( game -> nb_min_particles < 10 )
00165                                 game -> nb_min_particles = 10 ;
00166                                 
00167                 if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL ) /*error reading comment*/
00168     {
00169         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read comment ( line 9 ) in config.txt file !" );
00170                                 goto error ;
00171     }
00172 
00173     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL )
00174     {
00175         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read DRAWING_UPDATE_RATE in config.txt file !");
00176         goto error ;
00177     }
00178 
00179     game -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE = strtol( strbuf , NULL , 10 );
00180 
00181     if( game -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE < 0 )
00182     {
00183         n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "WARNING: You can not have a negative or zero GFX_UPDATE_RATE\nDefault value ( 20000 ) will be used" );
00184         game -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE = 20000;
00185     }
00186     else
00187         if( game -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE > 1000000 )
00188         {
00189            n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "WARNING: You would not want to have a 1 second GFX_UPDATE_RATE, no ?\nDefault value ( 20000 ) will be used" );
00190             game -> GFX_UPDATE_RATE = 20000;
00191         }
00192 
00193     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL ) /*error reading comment*/
00194     {
00195         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read comment ( line 11 ) in config.txt file ! \n");
00196                                 goto error ;
00197     }
00198 
00199     if( fgets( strbuf , 1024 , config ) == NULL )
00200     {
00201         n_log( LOG_ERR , "FATAL ERROR: Can not read LOGIC_RATE in config.txt file !");
00202         goto error ;
00203     }
00204 
00205     game -> LOGIC_RATE = strtol( strbuf , NULL , 10 );
00206 
00207     if( game -> LOGIC_RATE < 0 )
00208     {
00209         n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "WARNING: You can not have a negative or zero LOGIC_RATE\nDefault value ( 10000 ) will be used" );
00210         game -> LOGIC_RATE = 10000;
00211     }
00212     else
00213     {
00214                                 if( game -> LOGIC_RATE > 1000000 )
00215         {
00216             n_log( LOG_NOTICE , "WARNING: You would not want to have a 1 second LOGIC_RATE, no ?\nDefault value ( 10000 ) will be used" );
00217             game -> LOGIC_RATE = 20000;
00218         }
00219                 }
00220                 fclose( config );
00221                 goto clean ;
00222                 
00223                 error:
00224                                 destroy_game_env( &game );
00225                 
00226                 clean:
00227                 
00228                 return game ;
00229 } /* destroy_game_env */
